playn.core

Class Pointer.Adapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • playn.core.Pointer.Adapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer.Listener
    Enclosing interface:
    Pointer

    public static class Pointer.Adapter
extends Object
implements Pointer.Listener
    A Pointer.Listener implementation with NOOP stubs provided for each method.

      void onPointerCancel(Pointer.Event event)

      • onPointerCancel

        public void onPointerCancel(Pointer.Event event)
        Description copied from interface: Pointer.Listener
        Called when a drag is canceled (always after start and takes the place of end). This happens when Pointer.cancelLayerDrags() is called, or it can be initiated by the OS. Note: the coordinates of this event will be (0, 0) if initiated by Pointer.cancelLayerDrags().
        Specified by:
        onPointerCancel in interface Pointer.Listener
